newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Platinum Tech raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Platinum Tech raised to buy.

text.p: -- Chicago Corp said Friday it had raised Platinum Technology Inc to buy from hold.

-- Chicago Corp also revised its 1996 earnings estimate on Platinum to a loss of $0.30 a share, excluding merger costs and/or writeoffs of purchased research and development, from a loss of $0.20. Its 1997 estimate was cut to a profit of $0.55 a share from a profit of $0.80.
-- The rating upgrade, despite the lowered estimates, is based on expectations that Platinum can grow revenues at a 35 percent rate over the long term, Chicago Corp said.
